LongDescription:
Adds and/or removes Keywords of Armor records from any of the chosen mods based on several per-armor conditions:
 - KeywordRegex : checks if any of the Armor's keywords match this regex 
 - EditorIDRegex : checks if the EditorID matches the given regex
 - DisplayNameRegex : checks if the Display Name matches the given regex
 - AND : does not apply the keywords if any one of the provided non-empty rules isn't matched
 There is also an option for just selecting the Armors manually.
